ğŸ“ *Highway*
Make any hardware project, get up to 350 USD to build it! Keyboard, game console, rocket, robot, 3d printer, etc... Then, go to a 4-day hardware hackathon @ Github HQ this summer!

ğŸ“ *Sidequests*
A short-run low-volume low-effort ysws series from nora & co.

elements.text: #1: SkinAmp (ft. phoebe!) - Ship a WinAmp skin, we'll send you the WinAmp source code on CD-R (ended 2025-04-13). #2: gemerald - Write something useful in Ruby, i'll send you a sticker (best few get a book!) (started 2025-04-10, ending soon).

text.text:
ğŸ“ *Lockin*
Work on anything Wakatime-able on call with another Hack Clubber, spin for stickers at the end of the session.

ğŸ“ *HackCraft*
Create a Minecraft mod, and Hack Club sends you Minecraft Java!

elements.text: Join HackCraft to build and ship your own Minecraft mod. Access exclusive resources and a supportive community.
